dripsData.title: Boost Hub
dripsData.desc: Boost your Blood Cells!
dripsData.para1: Iron deficiency is one of the most difficult conditions to deal with. You may experience an unexplained lack of energy and dizziness which can interfere with your day-to-day bodily functions. This can be attributed to the lack of iron, vitamins, and other multi-trace minerals in the body. The Boost IV Drip consists of the key nutrients to help you boost your Iron levels in the body, therefore, preventing and curing Iron Deficiency Anemia.
dripsData.para2: The main ingredient of this IV drip is Iron. Iron is one of the most important components to produce blood cells. Iron absorption is enhanced by Vitamin C and Vitamin B12 which are also present in the drip. The drip also contains Folic Acid. Folic Acid and Vitamin B12 work together to produce red blood cells.
dripsData.benifitTitle: Get rid of Anemia and restore your body functions
benifits: Increases the body’s iron levels quickly – faster results
Helps your body to produce red blood cells and keep your nervous system healthy
Unlike oral supplements, less likelihood of experiencing unpleasant side effects

dripsData.para1: CLEANSE HUB is our signature and most loved IV drip, utilizing the detoxifying power of NAC (known as the “Master Antioxidant”) and Vitamin C to combat the toxic impact of an urban lifestyle while decreasing inflammation and promoting immunity.
dripsData.para2: N- Acetylcysteine increases your body’s ability to naturally detoxify, targeting the liver to flush out harmful toxins, as well as assisting in fighting off illness. Also helps with glowing skin.

dripsData.title: Energy Hub
dripsData.desc: Energy Hub Boost Energy Levels
dripsData.para1: Feel the power of natural energy with our IV Super B’s mix Energy hub. The family of B vitamins is used in just about every chemical reaction in the body, especially when it comes to providing energy, detoxifying the body, and mental clarity. Leave feeling refreshed with natural energy burning from within.
dripsData.para2: Boosts energy and provides the perfect “pick me up”, may increase metabolism and sexual vitality, and is great for adrenal fatigue, low energy levels, and long working hours.
dripsData.benifitTitle: Boost Your Energy

extraData.name: Carnitine
extraData.txt: This molecule has been well-studied extensively for energy production. Carnitine contributes to the transfer of long-chain fatty acids into mitochondria, which oxidizes that fat for energy. Ideal for weight loss, building muscle mass and boosting performance.

extraData.name: Taurine
extraData.txt: Taurine is essential for cardiovascular function and helps you maintain a healthy brain and heart. Furthermore, it can assist in lowering blood pressure, calming the nervous system, mitigating stress and fighting inflammation.

extraData.name: B-Vitamins
extraData.txt: The family of B vitamins is used in just about every chemical reaction in the body, especially when it comes to producing cellular energy, protecting the immune system, producing strong red blood cells, hormonal function and a healthy metabolism.

dripsData.title: Hairfall Defense
dripsData.desc: Supercharge your hair!
dripsData.para1: Some needles hurt and some don’t! IV Vitamins for hair are new to our nice-needle list. This IV includes a combination of B Vitamins and minerals for strengthening and fortification, guaranteed to give you renewed locks that you can flaunt.
dripsData.para2: The star ingredient of this IV Drip is Biotin. Vitamin b7 or Biotin is a B-complex vitamin that boosts the strength and appearance of your hair. It works largely by improving the infrastructure of your hair at the cellular level. The other vitamin and minerals in the drip work harmoniously to improve the quality of your hair by preventing sodium buildup (leading to reduced hair fall), accelerating follicle recovery, strengthening the hair shaft, and helping the body regulate cell turnover
dripsData.benifitTitle: Get Your Glow with Beauty Hub
benifits: Increases cell production for healthy skin, hair and nails
Reduces the risk of scalp inflammation
Improves collagen formation and hydrates the skin

extraData.name: Biotin
extraData.txt: Promotes hair growth by nourishing the roots and strengthening hair shafts

extraData.name: B12
extraData.txt: Hair loss is often a direct consequence of Vitamin B12. The B12 in our drop improves scalp and blood circulation, promoting hair growth.

extraData.name: Zinc
extraData.txt: Makes your hair follicles stronger by improving their basic structural integrity

dripsData.title: IV Wellness Supreme
dripsData.desc: Reverse the signs of aging
dripsData.para1: Our most powerful and comprehensive IV therapy — combining the forces of detox, immunity, recovery, and cellular revitalization
dripsData.para2: The IV Wellness Supreme Drip is designed to fast-track cellular regeneration, fortify your body’s defenses, and halt the visible signs of aging at their core.
dripsData.para3: Every day, your body produces billions of new cells — but with age, the risk of DNA degradation and cellular dysfunction increases.
dripsData.para4: Powered by a potent blend of metabolic co-enzymes, essential vitamins, antioxidants, and amino acids, the Supreme Drip restores, repairs, and revitalizes your cells from the inside out — preserving DNA integrity and promoting total-body renewal.
dripsData.para5: This master infusion restructures, remodels, and recharges every cell, unlocking the highest potential for energy, immunity, recovery, and longevity.
dripsData.para6: Revitalize Your Body from Within with the IV Wellness Supreme Drip At IV Wellness, we believe true wellness starts at the cellular level. The IV Wellness Supreme Drip is a scientifically advanced infusion, crafted to restore, recharge, and renew every system in your body — unlocking optimal health, natural radiance, and lasting vitality.
dripsData.para7: Experience the Ultimate Reset — a transformative infusion designed to renew your energy, restore your glow, and optimize your health from the inside out.

benifits: Amplifies natural energy for enhanced performance and daily vitality
Boosts immune defense to help your body stay resilient year-round
Promotes luminous skin, stronger hair, and healthier nails
Supports deep detoxification, flushing out harmful toxins and oxidative stress
Enhances mental clarity, focus, and mood balance
Accelerates muscle recovery and improves physical endurance
Replenishes hydration and essential nutrients for total-body rejuvenation
Promotes restful sleep and aids in nervous system relaxation
Improves metabolic function for better cellular repair and nutrient absorption

dripsData.title: Zeus Drip
dripsData.desc: Get your fertility game back on track with this Zeus Drip.
dripsData.para1: We live in a world full of toxins. When fertility issues arise, we have to look at the incubating system for the eggs and the sperm. Detoxing these systems and supporting them with essential vitamins can help the body reset itself and make for a fertile ground. When IVs are utilized with other healing modalities, fertility is possible. Sperm is highly sensitive to oxidative stress. The production of excessive amounts of free radicals contributes to the mechanism behind male factor infertility. Our Zeus Drip will help your body clear excessive free radicals + promote optimal fertilization while you plug and play.
dripsData.para2: The Zeus Drip contains Zinc, Selenium, Carnitine, 5 MTHF, Vitamin C and B 12. These are essential components in the IV Drip for fertility.
dripsData.benifitTitle: Reignite Your Fertility Journey

extraData.txt: Improves Sperm Quality, Boosts Testosterone

extraData.txt: Powering fertility, immunity, and peak male performance

dripsData.title: Queen Victoria Drip
dripsData.desc: Revitalize, Empower, Conceive: Elevate Your Fertility Journey with IV Therapy
dripsData.para1: For conception, your body requires a precise blend of vitamins and nutrients in order to function properly and protect the health of your internal environment. This can be a difficult goal to accomplish through diet and supplements alone. As a result, if you’re unknowingly deficient in certain vitamins, you can suffer from unexplained infertility, implantation failure, and recurrent miscarriage. Our Fertility Drip works by sending the vital nutrients you need directly into your blood stream, so your body receives them in their most potent and powerful form.
dripsData.para2: Our Queen Victoria Drip contains ingredients like 5MHTF, Megadose of Vitamin C, Rinoflavin, Magnesium, Vitamin B, Acetylcysteine and Zinc which are essential for conception and a healthy pregnancy.
dripsData.benifitTitle: Elevating Hope, Restoring Possibilities: Female Fertility IV Therapy for Your Journey Ahead
benifits: Improves egg quality resulting in better quality embryos
Increased chances of a healthy pregnance
Create an internal environment optimal for coneption
Eliminate toxins that could be further impeding fertility

dripsData.title: Chelation Therapy
dripsData.desc: Detoxify your body of heavy metals
dripsData.para1: More often than we realize, our bodies come across heavy metals such as lead, iron, arsenic, and mercury. These heavy metals can enter the bloodstream through pollution, water, food, air, and the environment. Especially in a highly developed place like United Arab Emirates, metal poisoning is common. Consequentially, we tend to suffer from chronic diseases due to the toxicity of these heavy metals. While most bodies have the capability of eliminating these toxic substances, others do not. This could be attributed to several reasons including existing medical conditions, poor diet, and cancerous tissues.
dripsData.para2: This is when IV Chelation Therapy in Dubai can be the ultimate solution.
dripsData.benifitTitle: Get Your Glow with Beauty Hub
benifits: Gets rid of heavy metals from body

dripsData.title: Performance Support
dripsData.desc: Unlock your muscle recovery potential with THE Amino Blend
dripsData.para1: Performance Support—a meticulously crafted amino blend designed to elevate your gym performance to unprecedented heights while offering comprehensive muscle recovery and an infusion of vitality, all while providing invaluable sexual support.
dripsData.para2: Harnessing the potent power of premium ingredients including L-carnitine, taurine, arginine, valine, lysine, and isoleucine, this groundbreaking formula is meticulously curated to synergistically enhance your physical prowess and stamina, ensuring every workout session is maximized to its fullest potential.
dripsData.benifitTitle: Ignites your energy reserve

extraData.name: L-Carnitine
extraData.txt: A hunger suppressing nutrient for weight loss that contributes to the transfer of longchain fatty acids into mitochondria for energy production.

extraData.name: Taurine
extraData.txt: Plays a crucial role in enhancing athletic performance by reducing muscle fatigue and supporting overall muscle function and endurance.

extraData.name: Arginine
extraData.txt: Arginine is renowned for its role in promoting vasodilation, which enhances blood flow and nutrient delivery to muscles during exercise, resulting in improved performance and faster recovery.

extraData.name: Valine, leucine, and isoleucine
extraData.txt: Collectively known as branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs), are essential for muscle growth, repair, and recovery after intense exercise, aiding in the synthesis of protein and reducing muscle breakdown.

dripsData.desc: complete beauty package for your skin, hair and nails
dripsData.para1: Royal Cleanse, meticulously formulated to orchestrate a comprehensive detoxification journey that revitalizes your body from within. Delve into a holistic detox experience that targets not only the body but also rejuvenates the gut and invigorates the liver, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.
dripsData.para2: Unlock the potent power of detoxifying superstars such as N-acetylcysteine (NAC) and glutathione, meticulously blended with the transformative properties of trimethylglycine (TMG), methylsulfonylmethane (MSM), and dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO). Embrace the royal treatment your body deserves as our carefully curated concoction sweeps away toxins, restores balance, and leaves you radiating with newfound vitality.

dripsData.title: NAD+ 100mg
dripsData.desc: The ULTIMATE Drip for your Mind and Body!
dripsData.para1: Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide (NAD) is one of the most essential molecules in our body, it is a coenzyme found in each of our living cells.
dripsData.para2: NAD is the cornerstone of maintaining healthy internal organs and a healthy neurological system. This IV therapy is a holistic, all-natural solution for those suffering from chronic disease and age-related health issues, and can boost overall wellness in healthy individuals. Through a standard drip, IV delivers NAD directly to your bloodstream, bypassing the gut for full absorption. For NAD, IV infusions are preferred over orally ingested alternatives because NAD is hard to process through the gastrointestinal tract.
dripsData.benifitTitle: Reverse the signs of aging
benifits: DNA repair AND repairs damaged cells
Protects Brain Cells AND Improves Mental Health
Enhances Athletic performance AND Weight loss

extraData.name: Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide
extraData.txt: Increased energy, improved memory, lower blood pressure, and lowered cholesterol
